definition: a good thing doesn't last forever (idiom)
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello

sentences.english: But Tobey again stroke, good times don't last long, no chance of recovery.
sentences.chinese: 但好景不长，托比再度中风，再无康复的可能了。

sentences.english: When I entered high school I was an A-student, but not for long. I wanted the fancy clothes.
sentences.chinese: 我进中学的时候是一个好学生，只是好景不长。
但这种合作或许好景不长。

sentences.english: But the short-lived, long before the Mongols to fight it because it needs horse.
sentences.chinese: 但是好景不长，没过多久，因为和蒙古人打仗需要马。

sentences.english: The thing is that there is always someone with better or more than you.
sentences.chinese: 但是好景不长，比较的对象最后往往变成比你强的人。

sentences.english: It doesn’t look so good now. In the last three years, the news out of Nokia has only been bad.
sentences.chinese: 可惜好景不长，近三年诺基亚频频传出负面消息。

sentences.english: Again, he runs into trouble within months.
sentences.chinese: 可是，好景不长，几个月后，他再次陷入麻烦。

sentences.english: When I entered high school I was an A-student, but not for long.
sentences.chinese: 我还记得刚入中学时，我还是个优等生，但好景不长。

sentences.english: Messrs Erdogan and Lula may not have long to savour their achievements.
sentences.chinese: 爱尔多安和卢拉可能好景不长。

definition: things turn out contrary to the way one wishes (idiom)
but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
it is a pity/what a pity/unfortunately
for a time/at one time/one time/once
lit. to drop a thousand zhang in one fall (idiom)/fig. (of business, popularity etc) to suffer a sudden, devastating decline/to take a dive
misfortune does not come singly (idiom)/it never rains but it pours
lit. like the sun at noon (idiom)/fig. to be at the peak of one's power, career etc
one stumble, unable to rise (idiom); a setback leading to total collapse/ruined at a stroke/unable to recover after a minor hitch
God's plans supersede our own/Man proposes but God disposes
pinyin: ren2 suan4 bu4 ru2 tian1 suan4
